title: Bug 116786: Library include should store relative path
description: When a library is included in a report design, the BIRT designer should generate and save the relative path. Currently, when a library is included, the absolute path is being saved instead of the relative path.
OB: The BIRT designer does not generate and save the relative path when including a library in a report design.
EB: The BIRT designer should generate and save the relative path for library inclusion in a report design.
SR: Modify the BIRT designer to generate and save the relative path when including a library in a report design.
